channel.title: Music on Alex Bachuk
channel.description: Recent content in Music on Alex Bachuk

item.title: End of summer playlist
item.description: It’s end of summer, time for some good music.

item.title: Music for coding
item.description: This time it’s more relaxing music, although with some house and pop influence. Great for early morning or late afternoon listening. I’ll keep adding tracks to this list. If you have some tracks you like that are similar to these, please, please leave a comment with a link. I’ll be happy to include it to my list. Enjoy.

item.title: Music for coding
item.description: Great mix by eSQUIRE Music. As always - adds energy and increases productivity :)

item.title: Music for coding
item.description: This mix by Avicii is great when you code, adds a lot of energy :)
